name: markdownlint-cli2-action
description: A GitHub Action to run the markdownlint-cli2 tool for linting Markdown/CommonMark files with the markdownlint library

scripts.docker-npm-install: docker run --rm --tty --name npm-install --volume $PWD:/home/workdir --workdir /home/workdir --user node node:16 npm install
scripts.docker-npm-run-upgrade: docker run --rm --tty --name npm-run-upgrade --volume $PWD:/home/workdir --workdir /home/workdir --user node node:16 npm run upgrade
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build && git diff --exit-code ':(exclude)dist/index.js'
